about_the_game:
In Calamities in the Dark you will plunge into the profanities of a terrible dungeon inhabited by countless Goblins.

But that's not all... The Goblins have evolved and you will find among them powerful enemies.

A game of turn-based tactical battles where your choices really matter!

Choose one of the 3 Heroes, each specialized in a type of branch of attacks and skills and choose three out of 9 possible companions to fight by your side.

You can improve your relationship with them to become your partner and improve their skills!

Of course, you must protect them, because the Goblins use human women to give birth to their progenitors - don't let them capture them, or it will be the end for them!

Strategic and demanding gameplay, death in the dungeon is permanent!

3 Heroes available to choose from.

9 Companions available to choose from.

The Dungeon consists of 200 Levels, procedurally generated.

More than 50 Skills Available to structure your team to your liking.

More than 40 different enemies.

Drop Equipment of different rarities.

No in-game purchases. ][/list]
